Unlocking The Vault: The Bible & More Uncovered Truths About Cancer Treatments Government Lied About (Video)
In this episode, VitaminB174U.com‘s John Richardson joins me to reveal some new information that has been stored away for decades that exposes the lies of government and Big Pharma concerning cancer, laetrile and what actually works to treat cancer. He also reveals some of the Bible verses that many doctors noted in their documents.
